install.name: S5 Image and Content Fader v2
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description: This module will display images of any url and user defined conent in one of 4 effect transitions. Powered by Mootools but if you experience conflicts you can enable legacy S5 Effects mode (contains less features than Mmootools version).

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-Text
param.description: Enter any pre-text message.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Enter the height of the image fader.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Enter the width of the image fader.

param.name: background
param.label: Background Color (leave blank for none) ex:FFFFFF
param.description: Enter the background color. Leave blank for none.

param.name: jslibrary
param.label: Choose Mootools or Legacy Mode (S5 Effects)
param.description: The new Mootools option has a directory slider and navigation arrows while s5 effects only displays the images and content

param.name: jseffect
param.label: Choose your effect (mootools version only)
param.description: Choose the effect you would like to happen between image transitions. Mootools versions only, S5 effects will just fade in and out

param.name: s5_dropdowntext
param.label: Drop Tab
param.description: Enter the text for drop down gallery tab if enabled

param.name: s5_delay
param.label: Delay Time
param.description: Enter the time in milliseconds for slide delay

param.name: s5_hidecar
param.label: Enable or Disable the picture carousel
param.description: Choose to enable or disable the carousel drop down thumbnail pictures

param.name: s5_hidebut
param.label: Enable or Disable the navigation arrows
param.description: Choose to enable or disable the left and right navigation arrows

param.name: s5_hidetext
param.label: Enable or Disable the slide text
param.description: Choose to enable or disable the slide text that pops up during each slide transition

param.description: Enter the text for the first slide title.
